root.name: Charly the Clown
root.description: OverviewCharly the Clown is a platforming game for DOS.GameplayIn Charly the Clown the player takes the role of Charly the Clown. The gameplay is standard platforming fare with the player going from the left to the right while avoiding enemies and obstacles and collecting coins and points.SharewareCharly the Clown was released as shareware and requires the player to have level codes. The shareware level codes are:ITSEASYMOREEASYLOLLYPOINGPARROT
